sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const CartDetails = () => { const { items } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); console.log(items); return ( <> {items.length === 0 ? (

Your Cart is empty

) : ( <>

Your Cart: {items.length} items

{/* cart Items */}
{items.map((item) => ( <>
{item.name}

{item.price}

- +
))}
)} ); }; export default CartDetails;
